name: Lizzie Oz
comment: So happy with making the switch, massive savings, supporting local business and giving back to the environment! Friendly, honest and reliable service.

name: Jasper Lee
comment: Great time of use tariffs that lets us timeshift our usage for ultra low rates. Perfect if you work from home or have an EV

name: Jordan Giles
comment: IO are a great company to deal with. They provide detailed personal service and best of all have saved us a significant sum of money on our power bill!

name: Stefan Carlson
comment: Made the switch to IO Energy and instantly started saving money. An easy way to pay less for electricity and not get ripped off by the big companies.

name: Rob B
comment: Very happy to have changed over. We don't have solar panels but can benefit from low prices during the day without having to pay for solar panel installation.

name: Jack Young
comment: The IO energy process to switch from another retailer was brilliant. A very efficient way to save myself money and support an SA business at the same time.

name: Amie
comment: Amazing customer service and the best rates. Can't imagine being with any other provider.
